content: * right side cut yarn d boucle join on yarn b beige 4-ply cont with 2 yarns as return to the 8 sts on lamb s right side with yarns c & d off-white foll 4-ply and boucle and 3 50mm smaller needles cont as foll left ear row 13 rs facing k across row 1 p 10 sts for left ear row 14-16 beg with a p row work 3 row st st *row 2 increase k3 kfb k2 kfb k3 12 ear sts row 17 decrease skpo k4 k2 decrease 6 right side face sts row 3 p12 row 18 p row 4 skpo k2 kfb k2 kfb k2 k2 decrease cut yarns and leave sts on a large safety pin for now row 5-6 repeat last 2 row once row 7 9 & 11 p left side row 8 decrease k3 skpo k2 k2 decrease k3 10sts return to the 8 sts on lamb s left side with needles and yarn as before row 10 decrease k2 skpo k2 k2 decrease k2 8sts row 14 ws facing p across row 12 decrease k1 skpo k2 k2 decrease k1 6sts row 15-16 work 2 row st st row 13 decrease p2 p2 decrease p2 5sts** row 17 decrease skpo k4 k2 decrease 6 left side face sts cut yarn thread ends through all 5 sts pull up to close up the sts and row 18 p secure the end lamb page 4 lamb page 5 head back neck rs facing rejoin yarns c & d off-white 4-ply and boucle to live sts and rejoin all 13 head back sts to a knitting needle with rs ready to knit across with 3 50mm/ size 4 smaller needles knit very next 7 sts for head back rs facing rejoin yarns c & d off-white 4-ply and boucle and with turn 3 50mm/ size 4 smaller needles cont as foll row 2 p7 row 1 kfb k3 skpo k1 k2 decrease k to last st kfb row 3 increase k1 kfb k3 kfb k1 9 head back sts row 2 p row 4 p15 row 3-6 repeat last 2 row twice row 5 increase k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 11 head back sts row 7 increase kfb k1 kfb k1 skpo k1 k2 decrease k1 kfb k1 kfb 15sts row 6 p17 row 8 p row 7 increase k3 kfb k3 kfb k3 13 head back sts switch to the larger needles 3 75mm/ size 5 cont as foll row 8 p13 pm at each end last row for ear back marker front neck cut yarns and leave 13 head back sts on a large safety pin for now row 9 increase cast on 7 sts k12 increase 7 cast on sts skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end rs facing rejoin yarns c & d off-white 4-ply and boucle cast on 5 sts 20sts k10 increase your cast on sts cast off last 4 sts cut yarn row 10 increase
